results.title: Effect of high uric acid on the disposition of metformin: in vivo and in vitro studies.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ (100 mg/kg) was administered orally to investigate the pharmacokinetics in control and @<m>DISEASE_Juvenile_gout</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537696 @@@hyperuricemic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, respectively.

citations.NLM: Zhang G, Ma Y, Xi D, Rao Z, Sun X, Wu X. Effect of high uric acid on the disposition of metformin: in vivo and in vitro studies. Biopharm Drug Dispos. 2019 Jan;40(1):3-11. PMID: 30488476
citations.BibTeX: @article{30488476, title={Effect of high uric acid on the disposition of metformin: in vivo and in vitro studies.}, author={Zhang G and Ma Y and Xi D and Rao Z and Sun X and Wu X}, journal={Biopharm Drug Dispos}, volume={40}, number={1}, pages={3-11}}

results.title: AMPK alleviates high uric acid-induced Na+-K+-ATPase signaling impairment and cell injury in renal tubules
results.text_hl: Although @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@ activation by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ did not reduce serum UA levels in @<m>DISEASE_Juvenile_gout</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537696 @@@hyperuricemic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, it significantly alleviated @DISEASE_Hyperuricemia @DISEASE_MESH:D033461 @@@HUA@@@-induced @DISEASE_Renal_Tubular_Transport_Inborn_Errors @DISEASE_MESH:D015499 @@@renal tubular injury@@@ and @GENE_TAC1 @GENE_6863 @@@NKA@@@ signaling impairment in vivo with effects similar to those of @CHEMICAL_Febuxostat @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069465 @@@febuxostat@@@.

citations.NLM: Xiao J, Zhu S, Guan H, Zheng Y, Li F, Zhang X, Guo H, Wang X, Ye Z. AMPK alleviates high uric acid-induced Na+-K+-ATPase signaling impairment and cell injury in renal tubules Exp Mol Med. 2019 May 22;51(5):1-14. PMID: 31118410
citations.BibTeX: @article{31118410, title={AMPK alleviates high uric acid-induced Na+-K+-ATPase signaling impairment and cell injury in renal tubules}, author={Xiao J and Zhu S and Guan H and Zheng Y and Li F and Zhang X and Guo H and Wang X and Ye Z}, journal={Exp Mol Med}, volume={51}, number={5}, pages={1-14}}
